title: Ep 292 | Miss Kay Doesnâ€™t Want Phil to Remarry and Why Hitchhikers Are Scared of Jase
description:
Phil and Jase discuss their wives' wishes for if they die. Jase tells another story from the road about a girl named "Pumpkin" and his two greatest fears in life. Phil remembers Miss Kay bringing his family bottled Cokes and how much better they taste. The guys discuss why hitchhiking is much different today than it was in the past.
